```{r CLT}
lambda <- 14
n <- 10
pop_se <- sqrt(lambda/n)  # the estimated SE
pop_se

x <- NULL
for (i in 1:1000) {
    x[i] <- mean(rpois(n = n, lambda = lambda))
}
hist(x, breaks = seq(from = lambda - 4 * sqrt(lambda)/sqrt(n), to = lambda +
    4 * sqrt(lambda)/sqrt(n), length.out = 20), probability = TRUE)
```
